languages.text: {n}Вторая копия со смехом указывает на мертвые тела.{/n} "Настоящая Кибелла лежит среди этих тел. Ты — лишь ее крошечный остаток, запятнанный ксеносами. Ты нечиста, и теперь ты запятнаешь своей скверной Домин?"

{n}The other double laughs and points at the dead bodies.{/n} "The true Kibellah lies among these corpses. You are just her vestige, her infinitesimal trace defiled by the xenos. You are unclean, and now you would stain the Domin with your abominable essence?"
languages.original_text: {n}Вторая копия со смехом указывает на мертвые тела.{/n} "Настоящая Кибелла лежит среди этих тел. Ты — лишь ее крошечный остаток, запятнанный ксеносами. Ты нечиста, и теперь ты запятнаешь своей скверной Домин?"

traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Alienation

traits.locale_text: {n}The quiet one points at the dead bodies.{/n} "I think the real Kibellah is lying in there somewhere. Not standing among us."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Alienation

traits.locale_text: {n}The other double laughs and points at the dead bodies.{/n} "The true Kibellah lies among these corpses. You are just her vestige, her infinitesimal trace defiled by the xenos. You are unclean, and now you would stain the Domin with your abominable essence?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The other double laughs and points at the dead bodies.{/n} "The true Kibellah lies among these corpses. You are just her vestige, her infinitesimal trace defiled by the xenos. You are unclean, and now you would stain the Domin with your abominable essence?"
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Alienation

languages.text: {n}La otra doble se ríe y señala a los cadáveres.{/n} «La verdadera Kibellah está entre estos cuerpos. No eres más que un vestigio, un rastro infinitesimal profanado por el xenos. Eres impura, ¿y pretendes además mancillar a{mf|l| la} Domin con tu esencia abominable?».
languages.original_text: {n}The other double laughs and points at the dead bodies.{/n} "The true Kibellah lies among these corpses. You are just her vestige, her infinitesimal trace defiled by the xenos. You are unclean, and now you would stain the Domin with your abominable essence?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La otra doble se ríe y señala a los cadáveres.{/n} «La verdadera Kibellah está entre estos cuerpos. No eres más que un vestigio, un rastro infinitesimal profanado por el xenos. Eres impura, ¿y pretendes además mancillar a{mf|l| la} Domin con tu esencia abominable?».
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Alienation

languages.text: {n}残りの2体は笑って死体を指さす。{/n}「本物のキベラは、あの死体の中に転がっている。お前は異種族に寄って汚された彼女のわずかな痕跡にすぎない。お前は汚れている。そして今、お前はその忌まわしい性質でもってドミンを汚そうというのか？」
languages.original_text: {n}The other double laughs and points at the dead bodies.{/n} "The true Kibellah lies among these corpses. You are just her vestige, her infinitesimal trace defiled by the xenos. You are unclean, and now you would stain the Domin with your abominable essence?"

traits.locale_text: {n}残りの2体は笑って死体を指さす。{/n}「本物のキベラは、あの死体の中に転がっている。お前は異種族に寄って汚された彼女のわずかな痕跡にすぎない。お前は汚れている。そして今、お前はその忌まわしい性質でもってドミンを汚そうというのか？」
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Alienation

languages.text: {n}另一个冒牌货大笑起来，指着遍地尸体。{/n}“真正的绮贝菈就躺在这些尸体之中。至于你，你不过是她的碎片，是异形在她身上留下的污痕。你是不净之人，如今却打算用你污秽的身躯来玷污秘者？”
languages.original_text: {n}The other double laughs and points at the dead bodies.{/n} "The true Kibellah lies among these corpses. You are just her vestige, her infinitesimal trace defiled by the xenos. You are unclean, and now you would stain the Domin with your abominable essence?"

traits.locale_text: {n}另一个冒牌货大笑起来，指着遍地尸体。{/n}“真正的绮贝菈就躺在这些尸体之中。至于你，你不过是她的碎片，是异形在她身上留下的污痕。你是不净之人，如今却打算用你污秽的身躯来玷污秘者？”
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Alienation

languages.text: {n}Die beiden andere lachen und deuten auf die toten Leiber.{/n} "Die wahre Kibellah ist eine dieser Leichen. Ihr seid nur ein Rest, ihre unendliche, von den Xenos befleckte, Spur. Ihr seid unrein und jetzt wollt Ihr {mf|den|die} Domin mit eurer abscheulichen Essenz besudeln?"
languages.original_text: {n}The other double laughs and points at the dead bodies.{/n} "The true Kibellah lies among these corpses. You are just her vestige, her infinitesimal trace defiled by the xenos. You are unclean, and now you would stain the Domin with your abominable essence?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die beiden andere lachen und deuten auf die toten Leiber.{/n} "Die wahre Kibellah ist eine dieser Leichen. Ihr seid nur ein Rest, ihre unendliche, von den Xenos befleckte, Spur. Ihr seid unrein und jetzt wollt Ihr {mf|den|die} Domin mit eurer abscheulichen Essenz besudeln?"
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Alienation

languages.text: {n}L'autre double éclate de rire et désigne les corps.{/n} « La vraie Kibellah gît parmi ces cadavres. Toi, tu n'es qu'un vestige de ce qu'elle était, une trace infinitésimale profanée par le xénos. Tu es impure, et tu voudrais souiller {mf|le|la} Domin de ton essence répugnante ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The other double laughs and points at the dead bodies.{/n} "The true Kibellah lies among these corpses. You are just her vestige, her infinitesimal trace defiled by the xenos. You are unclean, and now you would stain the Domin with your abominable essence?"

traits.locale_text: {n}L'autre double éclate de rire et désigne les corps.{/n} « La vraie Kibellah gît parmi ces cadavres. Toi, tu n'es qu'un vestige de ce qu'elle était, une trace infinitésimale profanée par le xénos. Tu es impure, et tu voudrais souiller {mf|le|la} Domin de ton essence répugnante ? »
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Alienation

languages.text: {n}Diğer kopya gülüyor ve ölü bedenleri işaret ediyor.{/n} "Gerçek Kibellah, bu cesetlerin arasında bir yerde. Sen yalnızca onun bir kalıntısısın. Onun zenolarca kirletilmiş küçücük bir zerresisin. Temiz değilsin ve bu iğrenç özünle Domin'i de mi kirleteceksin?"
languages.original_text: {n}The other double laughs and points at the dead bodies.{/n} "The true Kibellah lies among these corpses. You are just her vestige, her infinitesimal trace defiled by the xenos. You are unclean, and now you would stain the Domin with your abominable essence?"
